document_data.mainbody:
ist Granitdatter was a member of the Flaming Fist who served the city of Baldurs Gate in late 15 century DR.
Granitdatter was a dwarvish woman with pale skin, blue eyes, long strawberry blonde hair and a clean-shaven face. She wore a uniform of the Flaming Fist – a set of chain mails and a tabard adorned with the Flaming Fist insignia, with a large greataxe strapped to her back.
In the , Granitdatter was stationed just outside one of the gates between the Lower City of Baldurs Gate and its more affluent Upper City. Her and the fellow Fists job was stopping rabble from entering the Upper City, allowing only those with much coin through. The Fists managed a slow-moving queue of rich and poor – city folk trying to return home or just find safety behind the second set of walls.
